description: Post-fetch filters applied after fetching models (client-side validation using metadata)
why_postfetch: These filters use metadata fields from the fetched models for additional validation
note: Inference API filtering is now done at pre-fetch level (inference=warm) to get FREE serverless API models only

not_private.description: Model must not be private (should already be filtered by API, but double-check)

notes.inference_filtering: Moved to pre-fetch level - using inference=warm API parameter to get only models with FREE serverless Inference API
notes.endpoints_compatible_removed: endpoints_compatible tag indicates compatibility with PAID Inference Endpoints service, not free serverless API, so removed from filters
